titleStmt.title: Articles of peace between the Most Serene and Mighty Prince William the Third, King of Great Britain, and the Most Serene and Mighty Prince Lewis the Fourteenth, the most Christian King concluded in the Royal Palace at Ryswicke the 10/20 day of September, 1697.
Treaty of Ryswick (1697)
